/*
 * CC52-PleasingTheKing-IITI00.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 25-Apr-2012
 *      Author: Rishi
 */

#include <iostream>

int main () {
	int n;
	int k;
	int a;
	std::cin>>n>>k;

	int sum =0;

	for (int i=0; i<n-k; i++) {
		std::cin>>a;
		sum+=(-1*a);
	}

	for (int i=n-k; i<n; i++) {
		std::cin>>a;
		sum+=a;
	}

	std::cout<<sum<<std::endl;
	return 0;
}
